gallery.name: Flight day 2018
gallery.description: Paid a visit to the air show organized by the swedish armed forces in Uppsala.

image.description: The AJS 39 Viggen "Thunderbolt" coming in for landing.
Made in Sweden: J 32 Lansen, J 29 Tunnan, J 35 Draken, JAS 39 Gripen, SK 60, AJS 37 Viggen.

gallery.name: Trip to Northern Sweden
gallery.description: Went with some friends to the very north of Sweden to hopefully shoot some northern lights.

image.description: Reindeer are frequently seen on the roads.
When trying to spot northen lights, clouds are your worst enemy.
The ski lift at Riksgränsen, the very north of Sweden.
At times, the northern lights can barely be seen with the naked eye.

gallery.name: A trip to Crete, Greece 2013
gallery.description: We spent a week on the Greek island of Crete, home of beautiful beaches and ancient history.

image.description: The city of Platatias with the island Thodorou in the background, wagely resembling a turtle about to bite.
Lighttower in the port of Chania.
We went on a tour to see as much of the island as possible - too bad the weather wasn't quite playing along. A very exciting ride on narrow roads and high hills.
The beach at Elafonisi. The sand forms an interesting underwater landscape, making it possible to move between the islands if you choose the right path.
Moussaka - in case you haven't tried - do.
We went to the ancient city of Knossos - or what was left of it. Strangely, today it consist mostly of more or less accurately "reconstituted" buildings.

gallery.name: Canon EF 40mm Sample Shots
gallery.description: Some sample shots taken with the Canon EF 40mm 2.8 pancake and the Canon 600D.

gallery.name: Hong Kong and Vietnam 2012 Trip
gallery.description: We went to Hong Kong this year as well, and then spent some time relaxing in Mui Ne, Vietnam.

image.description: Bruce Lee, on the Avenue of Stars.
Overlooking the back of the peak.
From the Wong Tai Sin temple.
Taking the cable up the Takou mountain.
This Buddha statue is 49 meters long.
Popular means of transportation in Vietnam.

gallery.name: Photo Marathon 2012
gallery.description: One day, six different topics, publised hourly starting from 9 am: 25th of February 2012 was the first Photo Sunday Photo Marathon. I went for street photography. Here are my submissions.

gallery.name: Canon 600D Sample Shots
gallery.description: Some sample shots taken with the Canon EOS 600D.

gallery.name: A week on Menorca, Spain
gallery.description: We went to the island of Menorca for one week. The island is situated close to Mallorca, but is significantly more quiet.

image.description: One of many beautiful and difficult to reach beaches.
Apparently, this cave was used by smugglers. We went for a swim inside.
Typical street in the small city if Ciutadella.
Cova de Xoroi, a bar in the caves.
We also had some strong winds.
Things you find at the beach.
The sunset shot of the vacation.

gallery.name: Summer in Sweden 2011
gallery.description: Went to Sweden this summer (as usual). Beautiful (also as usual).

image.description: The bridge between Sweden and Denmark.

gallery.name: Photo Sunday
gallery.description: These are some pictures I have submitted to Fotosöndag (English: Photo Sunday). They can also be found in my photo stream on Flickr. Another theme and another picture each week.

gallery.name: Hong Kong Trip 2011
gallery.description: This year, we went to Hong Kong via Shanghai, and then continued on to Taiwan.

image.description: ''Water Village'', close to Shanghai, at sunset.
View from the Shanghai Financial Center.
The famous Maglev train in Shanghai.
Hong Kong: Residential area at night.
Busy shopping street in Hong Kong.
The mass damper in the top of Taipei 101, with a weight of 660 metric tonnes.
We went to Ocean Park in Hong Kong to see some Pandas.
Hong Kong Ocean Park had an impressive dolphin show as well.

gallery.name: Trip to Egypt 2010
gallery.description: As Germany was getting colder, we booked a trip to to Hurghada, Egypt.

image.description: Got up early to catch the sunrise.
A lot of people were hanging around the pyramids, more than happy to sell you something.
Still close to the pyramids of Giza. Cairo in the background.
Me and Ivy in front of the Pyramid of Khafra.
Me in front of the Sphinx.
Our last day. Sunset and a plane taking off.

gallery.name: Sweden summer trip 2010
gallery.description: Went to Sweden for a week to visit friends and family.

image.description: A passage grave. A lot of these around my hometown. Built around 3000 BC.
Cows, my hometown has a high density of these.
As we were out walking, we found a toad.

gallery.name: Berlin trip
gallery.description: We went to Berlin for the weekend. This was my second visit, but there were still plenty of things to see.

image.description: Brandenburger Gate, an important landmark in Berlin.
Jewish memorial. Don't ask me what large concrete blocks have to do with the holocaust.
A part of the Berlin wall.
East Berlin was full of graffiti. But this one is quite creative, serving as a sign for a dental practice (Zahnarzt means dentist).
Checkpoint Charlie, the main gate between East and West Berlin.
A model of an ESA rocket.
We went to a medieval style restaurant. I guess they liked meat back then.
At the Sachsenhausen concentration camp. The sign reads "Work liberates".
Still in the Sachsenhausen concentration camp. "Trespassers will be shot immediately without warning".

gallery.name: UAE, Thailand and Hong Kong
gallery.description: Went to Dubai, Bangkok and Hong Kong in February. Lots of stuff to see.

image.description: Burj Khalifa - so tall, it almost feels unreal.
We went for some dune bashing in the desert.
Traffic in the Causeway Bay area.
Small waterfall in Hong Kong Park.

gallery.name: Greece 2009 trip
gallery.description: A trip to the island of Corfu in October.

gallery.name: Canon EOS 1000D sample pics
gallery.description: Some pictures shot with the new Canon 1000D.

gallery.name: Hong Kong, Beijing and Shanghai
gallery.description: Tour to China, this time to Hong Kong, Beijing and Shanghai. Big cities. They really make Frankfurt feel like my small hometown in Sweden in comparison to them.

image.description: Yes, those are scorpions. And those to the left, seahorses.
Climbing the great wall was actually more difficult than I thought.
You can actually buy fish directly from the boats.
Famous and typical view of Shanghai.
The light show in Hong Kong.

gallery.name: Winter in Baden-Baden
gallery.description: Went to Baden-Baden and took the cable railway up to the Merkur summit.

gallery.name: A week in Croatia
gallery.description: City of Bol, on the island of Brac. Season over, but still warm and beautiful.

gallery.name: Hamburg in October
gallery.description: Went on a trip to Hamburg. Also visited Schwerin, Wismar and Lübeck.

image.description: Restaurant in Wismar; the city used to belong to Sweden.

gallery.name: Limburg in May
gallery.description: My brother and his girlfriend came to visit us in Frankfurt. Made a trip to Limburg.

gallery.name: Andermatt ski trip
gallery.description: Went on a ski trip to Andermatt, Switzerland over the weekend.

image.description: Nice weather all the way up to 3000 meters.
This guy actually managed to land just fine.
Marlene and Karin in the snow.
When you fall, at least it is soft.
The sun came out only partially on sunday.

gallery.name: Ricoh Caplio R7 sample pics
gallery.description: These are some of the first pictures I shot with the R7. All are 3MP and not the full 8MP the camera is capable of.

gallery.name: Ivy's birthday, karaoke party
gallery.description: Ivy's birthday. What would fit better than karaoke?

gallery.name: Paris trip
gallery.description: Me and Ivy went to Paris over the weekend.

gallery.name: Turkey trip
gallery.description: Me and Ivy went to Turkey for a week.

gallery.name: Still summer
gallery.description: September, street party.

gallery.name: Parents visit - August
gallery.description: We went to Rüdesheim. Nice weather - at least the first few days.

gallery.name: My birthday
gallery.description: I got the best birthday present ever!

gallery.name: Johan's farewell party
gallery.description: Lots of people, lots to drink, little space.

image.description: Is this some traditional german ritual?
The gift was a flight back to germany.
Can you see the swedish flag?
For more information, please google "stampa med leroy".

gallery.name: Erica's party
gallery.description: We had a lot of fun. We'll miss you!

image.description: Most swedish girls look like this. Roughly.
Nudeleis. This is really noodles mixed with ice cream.
We went to some nice bar.

gallery.name: Midsommar 2007
gallery.description: Important day for us swedish people. It was raining as usual.

image.description: We eat this food only three times a year.
We pretended to have a picnic and sat on the floor.
I celebrated midsommar and got this happy.

gallery.name: Second cardboard computer.
gallery.description: Got some new hardware and needed to upgrade.

image.description: Without the box. Looks messy, but it starts!
The box. Apparently used for A3-letters.
Cut some holes and put everything in. Fits perfectly.
With cover on, the computer has a simple and clean look to it. And easy to maintain; just take the cover off again.
Maybe not the best place for an optical unit...

gallery.name: Sweden and Denmark trip.
gallery.description: I like Sweden.

image.description: We found some piglets and tried to make close-up shots.
Ivy again. This is somewhere south of the famous mermaid.
How impressive is this anyway? More famous than impressive, I would say.
Christiania. It's still 1970 around here. On the wall: "When I hear the word culture, I release the safety of my gun."
Vättern again, right next to my parents' cottage.

gallery.name: Hongkong trip.
gallery.description: Me and my girlfriend went to Hongkong and China. A very special trip.

image.description: Pineapple buns! I went crazy over these.
Me. Also note Hongkong in the background.
The harbor. Apparently the world biggest.
The Buddha statue is somewhere on the other side.
He is not so big after all.
I want to reclaim my tax. It is here, right?

gallery.name: The cardboard computer.
gallery.description: 100% recycled parts!

image.description: It actually starts! Running Puppy Linux.
The inside. Still lots of space.

gallery.name: Sweden-Paraguay.
gallery.description: FIFA 2006. Sweden wins, 1-0.

image.description: Looks a bit like my tv.
This is how we usually sing the national anthem.
In case you wonder, this is the latest book cover with Fabio.

gallery.name: Austria trip, april 2006.
gallery.description: We go to Austria. Great weather, great beer.

image.description: This girl was rejected from the group after using foul words.
We rented our equipment from some danish-speaking guy. What was his name again? Something macho, like "storm" or something. Anyway...
Hey, this is not even a good picture...
Sky with some shiny object in front of it.
This is how you ski in Karstadt.
It seems like I have zero interesting pictures with people from this trip.

gallery.name: Some nice pictures.
gallery.description: Taken with a simple digital camera at some random places.

image.description: A white flower. Shot close to my office.
